履帶.definition: caterpillar track (propulsion system used on bulldozers etc); (literary) shoes and belt

履新.definition: (of an official) to take up a new post; (literary) to celebrate the New Year

履歷.definition: background (academic and work); curriculum vitae; résumé

履約.definition: to keep a promise; to honor an agreement

履職.definition: to fulfill one's job or duty

履舄交錯.definition: lit. shoes and slippers muddled together (idiom); fig. many guests come and go; a lively party

履行.definition: to fulfill (one's obligations); to carry out (a task); to implement (an agreement); to perform

履險如夷.definition: lit. to make one's way through a dangerous pass as if walking on level ground (idiom); fig. to handle a crisis effortlessly
